Articles.Content: I have a windows Vista OS and (yes I know Vista OS sucks)but its all I have at this time. Anyway, mods wont work for me at all. The parts show up in the game but seems the plugin .dll dont work or do anything. Anybody else have this problem? Plus I dont know where the saved files are saved with this OS. I look in the KSP save folder but see no saved files but they are saved somewhere due to that they are there when I run the game. Can anybody help me with this problem cuss I want to use Mods...Thanks
